## -save_binary argument
example cli:
```
./cli/hpe -train train.graph -save_binary 1 -save hpe.model -sample_times 1
```
example printing info.
```
Connections Preview:
        # of connection:        6955127
Connections Loading:
        Progress:               100.00 %
        # of vertex:            1220589
Build the Alias Method:
        Reconstructing Graph ...
        Building Alias Tables ...
        Finished.
Model Setting:
        dimension:              64
Model:
        [HPE]
Learning Parameters:
        sample_times:           1
        negative_samples:       5
        walk_steps:             5
        regularization:         0.01
        alpha:                  0.025
        workers:                1
Start Training:
        Alpha: 0.000250 Progress: 100.00 %%
Save Model:
        Save keys to <hpe.model.key>
        Save vectors to <hpe.model.vec>
```

# to read the binary data in python
```
>>> import msgpack
>>> keys = msgpack.unpackb(open("hpe.model.key", "rb").read())
>>> vecs = msgpack.unpackb(open("hpe.mdeol.vec", "rb").read())
>>> len(keys), len(vecs)
(1220589, 1220589)
>>> keys[1024]
b'boot-from'
>>> vecs[1024]
[0.004297575372900846, 0.00014087629203507016, 0.0032086012743683763, -0.0016159863843674082, 0.003609520584571152, -0.006612849287639302, 1.0005776668645614e-05, 7.207031256498968e-05, -0.0014241508502544587, 0.00042221528069095484, -0.005658181999840819, -0.004870353589794164, 0.0030262718839957612, 0.0003923574831425861, 0.0024067265604884773, -0.004581008973052053, -0.007733939836149756, -0.0028943988254109287, 0.004614733571265834, 0.00011581472169505279, 0.0003636633505285313, -0.0004041681037479639, -0.00633398627402116, -0.003948937497414427, 0.002243182491094466, 0.0067115187488231455, -0.004030346943477978, -0.0062217881673241405, 0.0003426025038620287, 0.002794621399156786, -0.007283418971954459, -0.0031377535106006252, -0.004857547532761426, 0.00373379418086523, 0.00302814076777233, 0.006593889854880859, 0.0049284760987146495, -0.004828855003596419, -0.0011827660665926763, -0.004291904311297183, 0.003420852880165959, 0.0009688229412104615, -0.0013699816335271163, -0.0013603770001551566, -0.0064476176935270866, -0.006774612596348903, 0.0018535193594620093, -0.0064297009389218075, -0.0018122157148797906, -0.0013577478714868246, 0.0015430406900137769, 0.006350967774526738, 0.0060481912015708725, 0.0030103203368332778, -0.0053963922746467375, 0.00047919716584614427, 0.001926734341137573, -0.0016141420013188312, 0.0020370082256301264, -0.005538694131020469, -0.006582419363536957, 0.0025730850658305764, -0.0008697904855620878, -0.003649200541073258]
```
